poolTricks.name: Belly Flop
poolTricks.description: The jumper lands flat on their stomach. Often unintentional and potentially painful.

poolTricks.name: Back swim
poolTricks.description: Swim on your back across the pool

poolTricks.name: Butterfly Handstand
poolTricks.description: Do a handstand underwater with legs spread

poolTricks.name: Surf
poolTricks.description: Put a float under your feet and surf on it.

poolTricks.name: Cowboy Ride
poolTricks.description: Ride a float like a cowboy. Yee-haw!

poolTricks.name: Dance Party
poolTricks.description: Have a dance party in the pool

poolTricks.name: Belly On Bottom
poolTricks.description: Lay on your belly on the bottom of the pool

poolTricks.name: Floor is Lava
poolTricks.description: The floor is lava! Get out of the pool!

trampolineTricks.name: Seat Drop
trampolineTricks.description: A basic trick where the jumper bounces and lands in a sitting position with legs straight, then bounces back to their feet.

trampolineTricks.name: Swivel Hips
trampolineTricks.description: From a seat drop, the jumper spins 180 degrees and lands in another seat drop facing the opposite direction.

trampolineTricks.name: Back Drop
trampolineTricks.description: The jumper lands on the trampoline on their back and immediately rebounds back to their feet.
